rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming area with a coat closet and reception desk adhering to Vastu recommendations.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen & Living Area
rooms.description: Combined kitchen and living space designed with ergonomic workflow; includes dining table and seating arrangements. Adheres to Vastu principles of east-west orientation for energy flow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom A
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom featuring a private balcony, south-facing windows, and built-in wardrobe.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom B
rooms.description: Secondary master bedroom with attached balcony, north-east facing to maximize morning sunlight as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bedroom C
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with a balcony and south-west orientation ensuring proper ventilation and light distribution.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom D
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom featuring an adjacent balcony for extra privacy; north-east oriented to harness beneficial energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom E
rooms.description: Family or children's bedroom with a balcony and south-facing windows for balanced energy.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Spacious bathroom designed to be used by multiple occupants with proper ventilation and natural light considerations per local norms.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Service area for storage of cleaning supplies and maintenance equipment, following safety regulations.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Reinforced entrance door ensuring security and adhering to local building norms.

openings.name: Balcony Accesses
openings.description: Multiple balcony access points integrated with bedroom windows for aesthetic appeal and ventilation.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: Secondary entrance designed for easy maintenance and utility access.

openings.name: Garden Entrance
openings.description: Entrance to the large garden area complementing the farmhouse aesthetic with an emphasis on natural landscaping.

comments.text: The design is carefully planned for a single-story 5BHK townhouse on an irregular plot. The open-plan kitchen and living area, combined with multiple spacious balconies, provide ample light and ventilation per Vastu principles. The layout accommodates a large garden that extends seamlessly into the outdoor spaces.
